translations: v.（用机器）加工，操作；用缝纫机缝制（machine 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 加工中心；多工序自动数控机床
精密加工；精密机械加工
加工精度；精加工精确度
电火花加工；[电]放电机械制作

sentences.sentence: It will save considerable machining time to use more than one tool in one machine to perform several machine operations either in sequence or simultaneously.
sentences.translation: 在一台机器上使用数种刀具来顺次或同时进行几项机器操作，将节省大量加工时间。

sentences.sentence: He observed when people were machining cannon barrels, a lot of heat was generated, and there was a lot of work done.
sentences.translation: 他发现人们在制作炮管时，会产生大量的热，同时有大量的做功。

sentences.sentence: They also must distinguish between corrosion pits, cracks and welded machining repairs.
sentences.translation: 它们还必须能够区分是腐蚀、裂纹还是焊缝修复。
